resources.string: Please enter the username and/or password
The password must be between 8 and 16 digits long and must contain at least three types of the following: uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special symbols
The length of the username needs to be between 6 and 16 bits and cannot contain special characters.
This user already exists. Please enter another username.
Password and username do not match
Please enter the job name and/or description
The length of Job name must be lower than 20 digits and cannot contain special characters
The length of description must be lower than 50 digits
